analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika micchat taniya tattika

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namicchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na micchatta niyatam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ micchatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na sammatta niyatam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ sammatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho aniyato
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ aniyataḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa
